yaml.title: Cruce de variables (descriptivo)
yaml.subtitle: Proyecto: Adherencia HM en el Centro de Simulaci√≥n

markdown.markdown:
- [√çndice](../index.html)
- [Ingesta de datos](00_main.html)
- [Cruce de variables (descriptivo)](01_eda.html)

```{r}

options(error = NULL)  # Resetear manejo de errores

setwd("C:/Users/mario.camacho/OneDrive - UFV/Hospitales CAM")
setwd(file.path(getwd(), "Sureste/Bea Isidoro 202511/20251118 Adherencia Higiene Manos en Centro de Simulaci√≥n Cl√≠nica"))
source('scr/zz_libraries.R')
source('scr/zz_funciones.R')

# Opciones globales de chunk
opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.height = 4,
  fig.align = "center",
  out.width = "80%",
  fig.show = "hold"
)

# Espaciado entre im√°genes en HTML
cat("<style>img { margin-bottom: 20px; }</style>")

options(skimr.max_char = 100) # Para que no trunque los nombres de los factores

data <- readRDS("raw/data.rds")
```

# Preparativos

```{r}
num_vars <- names(data)[sapply(data, is.numeric)]
cat_vars <- names(data)[sapply(data, is.factor)]
cat_combs <- combn(cat_vars, 2, simplify = FALSE)
cat_combs3 <- combn(cat_vars, 3, simplify = FALSE)
mix_combs <- expand.grid(num_vars = num_vars, cat_vars = cat_vars, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

cat("Variables num√©ricas:", length(num_vars), "\n")
cat("Variables categ√≥ricas:", length(cat_vars), "\n")
for(var in cat_vars) {
  cat("\nVariable:", var, "\n")
  cat("Niveles:", paste0("'",levels(data[[var]]),"'   "), "\n")
  cat("Conteo:", table(data[[var]]), "\n")
  cat("NAs:", sum(is.na(data[[var]])), "\n")
}

# Crear densidades de las num√©ricas por categ√≥ricas
density_plots <- map2(mix_combs$num_vars, mix_combs$cat_vars, ~ analysis_num_cat(.x, .y, data))

# Crear mosaicos robustos
results <- map(cat_combs, ~ create_facet_mosaic(.x[1], .x[2], data))
mosaic_tables <- compact(map(results, "table"))
mosaic_plots <- compact(map(results, "plot"))


results <- map(cat_combs3, ~ create_facet_mosaic3(.x[1], .x[2], .x[3], data))
mosaic_tables3 <- compact(map(results, "table"))
mosaic_plots3 <- compact(map(results, "plot"))

# for (i in seq_along(mosaic_plots)) {
#   png(filename = paste0("plots/plot_", i, ".png"), width = 800, height = 600)
#   mosaic_plots[[i]]()
#   dev.off()
# }

# Crear heatmaps estad√≠sticos
results <- map(cat_combs, ~ create_statistical_heatmap(.x[1], .x[2], data))
heatmap_tables <- compact(map(results, "table"))
heatmap_plots <- compact(map(results, "plot"))

# Crear heatmaps de proporciones
results <- map(cat_combs, ~ create_double_heatmap(.x[1], .x[2], data))
double_heatmaps_tables <- compact(map(results, "table"))
double_heatmaps_plots <- compact(map(results, "plot"))
```

# Resumen r√°pido

```{r}
# 1. Resumen r√°pido
skim(data)
# data |> group_by(curso) |> skim()

# 2. Resumen detallado
dfSummary(data)

# 3. Estructura y missing
vis_miss(data)
gg_miss_var(data)

# 4. Matriz de correlaciones y scatter plots
ggpairs(data)

# 5. An√°lisis univariado
# Para las variables num√©ricas
if(length(num_vars) > 0) {
  data %>% select_if(is.numeric) %>% gather() %>% ggplot(aes(value)) + geom_histogram() + facet_wrap(~key, scales = "free")
}
# Para las variables categ√≥ricas
if(length(cat_vars) > 0) {
  data|> select_if(~is.factor(.) | is.character(.)) %>% gather() %>% ggplot(aes(x = value)) + geom_bar() + facet_wrap(~key, scales = "free")
}

# 6. An√°lisis bivariado
# Para los pares de variables num√©ricas
if(length(num_vars) > 0) {
  ggpairs(data, 
          columns = which(sapply(data, is.numeric)),
          upper = list(continuous = wrap("points", alpha = 0.5, size = 0.5)),
          lower = list(continuous = wrap("smooth", method = "lm", se = FALSE)),
          diag = list(continuous = wrap("barDiag", alpha = 0.5)))
}
```

# Densidades de las variables num√©ricas

```{r}
if(length(density_plots) > 0) {
  cat("\nüìä MOSTRANDO DENSIDADES:\n")
  for(p in density_plots) { # en loop para que no salgan los idx de la lista
    print(p)
  }
  # wrap_plots(density_plots[1:length(density_plots)], ncol = 1)
}
```

# Gr√°fico de barras apiladas

```{r}
if(length(mosaic_plots) > 0) {
  cat("\nüìä MOSTRANDO BARRAS APILADAS:\n")
  for(p in mosaic_plots) {
    print(p)
  }
  # wrap_plots(mosaic_plots[1:length(mosaic_plots)], ncol = 1)
}
```

# Heatmaps de frecuencias y proporciones

```{r}
if(length(heatmap_plots) > 0) {
  cat("\nüî• MOSTRANDO HEATMAPS ESTAD√çSTICOS:\n")
  for(i in seq(length(heatmap_plots))) {
    print(heatmap_plots[[i]])
    print(double_heatmaps_plots[[i]])
  }
  # wrap_plots(heatmap_plots[1:length(heatmap_plots)], ncol = 1)
}
```

# Gr√°fico de barras apiladas con desagregaci√≥n por un tercer nivel

```{r}
if(length(mosaic_plots3) > 0) {
  cat("\nüìä MOSTRANDO BARRAS APILADAS '3D':\n")
  for(p in mosaic_plots3) {
    print(p)
  }
  # wrap_plots(mosaic_plots[1:length(mosaic_plots)], ncol = 1)
}

# Mostrar heatmaps de proporciones
# if(length(double_heatmaps_plots) > 0) {
  # cat("\nüìà MOSTRANDO HEATMAPS DE PROPORCIONES:\n")
  # for(p in double_heatmaps_plots) {
    # print(p)
  # }
  # wrap_plots(double_heatmaps_plots[1:length(double_heatmaps_plots)], ncol = 1)
# }

# An√°lisis completos para las combinaciones
### Imposible sacarlo en un tama√±o visible en HTML
# if(length(cat_combs) > 0) {
#   cat("\nüéØ MOSTRANDO AN√ÅLISIS COMPLETOS:\n")
#   complete_analyses <- map(cat_combs[1:length(cat_combs)], 
#                            ~ create_compact_analysis(.x[1], .x[2], data))
#   
#   opts_chunk$set(
#     fig.width = 600,
#     fig.height = 400
#   )
#   
#   
#   for(p in complete_analyses) {
#     print(p)
#   }
#   
# }
```

```{r}
# Set up ------------------------------------------------------------------

setwd(file.path(getwd(), "Sureste/Bea Isidoro 202511/20251118 Adherencia Higiene Manos en Centro de Simulaci√≥n Cl√≠nica"))

source('scr/zz_funciones.R')

# Opciones globales de chunk
opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.height = 4,
  fig.align = "center",
  out.width = "80%",
  fig.show = "hold"
)

# Espaciado entre im√°genes en HTML

data <- readRDS("raw/data.rds")
```

```{r}
num_vars <- names(data)[sapply(data, is.numeric)]
cat_vars <- names(data)[sapply(data, is.factor)]

cat_combs3 <- combn(cat_vars, 3, simplify = FALSE)
mix_combs <- expand.grid(num_vars = num_vars, cat_vars = cat_vars, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

cat("Variables num√©ricas:", length(num_vars), "\n")
cat("Variables categ√≥ricas:", length(cat_vars), "\n")
for(var in cat_vars) {
  cat("\nVariable:", var, "\n")
  cat("Niveles:", paste0("'",levels(data[[var]]),"'   "), "\n")
  cat("Conteo:", table(data[[var]]), "\n")
  cat("NAs:", sum(is.na(data[[var]])), "\n")
}

# Crear densidades de las num√©ricas por categ√≥ricas
density_plots <- map2(mix_combs$num_vars, mix_combs$cat_vars, ~ analysis_num_cat(.x, .y, data))

# Crear mosaicos robustos
results <- map(cat_combs, ~ create_facet_mosaic(.x[1], .x[2], data))
mosaic_tables <- compact(map(results, "table"))
mosaic_plots <- compact(map(results, "plot"))

mosaic_plots3 <- compact(map(results, "plot"))

#   dev.off()

# Crear heatmaps estad√≠sticos

heatmap_tables <- compact(map(results, "table"))
heatmap_plots <- compact(map(results, "plot"))

# Crear heatmaps de proporciones

double_heatmaps_tables <- compact(map(results, "table"))
double_heatmaps_plots <- compact(map(results, "plot"))
```

```{r}
# 1. Resumen r√°pido

# 4. Matriz de correlaciones y scatter plots

# 6. An√°lisis bivariado

          lower = list(continuous = wrap("smooth", method = "lm", se = FALSE)),

}
```
